'''Sceptanar''' was the title given to the ruler of [[Cimbar]] in [[Chessenta]].
document_data.History: The position of sceptanar was usually held by a powerful [[wizard]]. They lived within the [[Palace of the Sceptanar]]. The sceptanar held total authority, though they were advised by a council of elected land-owners.
